item.title: Simona add a quote by Jerome K. Jerome
item.description: "I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours." -- Jerome K. Jerome

item.title: Simona add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Simona add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Simona add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Simona add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well." -- Jack London

item.title: Simona add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The secret to getting ahead is getting started." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Simona add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Simona add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Simona add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Simona add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Simona add a quote by pablo neruda
item.description: "You are like nobody since I love you." -- pablo neruda

item.title: Simona add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Simona add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Simona add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Simona add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Simona add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Simona add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "There are years that ask questions and years that answer." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Simona add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Simona add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Simona add a quote by Terry McMillan
item.description: "Too many of us are hung up on what we don't have, can't have, or won't ever have. We spend too much energy being down, when we could use that same energy – if not less of it – doing, or at least trying to do, some of the things we really want to do." -- Terry McMillan

item.title: Simona add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Simona add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Simona add a quote by Donald Bell
item.description: "If you say “I don't read” like it's something to be proud of, punch yourself in the face repeatedly." -- Donald Bell

item.title: Simona add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Sorrow is how we learn to love. Your heart isn't breaking. It hurts because it's getting larger. The larger it gets, the more love it holds." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Simona add a quote by Muriel Spark
item.description: "To me education is a leading out of what is already there in the pupil's soul." -- Muriel Spark

item.title: Simona add a quote by Julian Barnes
item.description: "This was another of our fears: that Life wouldn't turn out to be like Literature." -- Julian Barnes

item.title: Simona add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: Simona add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Simona add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Simona add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Hell is—other people!" -- Jean-Paul Sartre
